properties.Observation: Water supplied to 20 Acres of paddy.  Total canal length is 800m. Remains as an earthen canal.
properties.Description: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining  For  100mm thick , 0.3m  wide  and 0.3m high canal -double bankingStream / canal  reservation protection by earthfilling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2m wide  and average Depth of 0.5mVegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover cropMiscellaneousContingencies 10%

properties.Observation: The existing canal has been concreted 50m length(height=0.45m, width=0.45m, thickness 0.125m). The rest of the canal is an earthen canal.  Total canal length is 1000m. 40 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.

properties.Observation: Water supplied to 15 Acres of paddy.  Total canal length is 700m. Remains as an earthen canal.
